title: The Bomb!

main.content: After enters the room, he hears a strange ticking sound. After investigating, he sees a bomb hidden behind the door!

diffuseBomb.content:
{this.name} tries to diffuse the bomb by entering the code or cutting one of the wires. As he makes the decision, {this.name}'s life flashes before his eyes.

Bomb code:

bombDiffused.content:
{this.name} diffused the bomb and saved the day!

The end.
